attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence, without a statute of limitations, for taxpayer pounds to be used to bribe big corporations.
attributes.additional_details: It has been reported that BAE have been promised huge taxpayer funded bungs to not close Govan shipyard in view of the impending referendum in Scotland.  If this turns out to be true then the politicians who perpetrated it, for their own party political advantage, MUST be brought before our courts and put in jail - NO MATTER HOW LONG IT TAKES.
